channel.title: Offline file writing
channel.description: i made a grand exchange, but i have 1 last problem, when the owner of the item is offline he doesnt get the money that he sold the item for. How can i make it so that when they buy the item it goes into his player file and changes an integer? (when hes offline)

item.title: Offline file writing
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

i made a grand exchange, but i have 1 last problem, when the owner of the item is offline he doesnt get the money that he sold the item for.
How can i make it so that when they buy the item it goes into his player file and changes an integer? (when hes offline)
